flavor_text_entries.black:
When threatened, it attacks by
shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives
it a chance to escape by rolling away.
flavor_text_entries.white:
They stick their spikes into cave
walls and absorb the minerals
they find in the rock.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It absorbs the iron it finds in the
rock while clinging to the ceiling.
It shoots spikes when in danger.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It absorbs the iron it finds in the
rock while clinging to the ceiling.
It shoots spikes when in danger.
flavor_text_entries.x:
When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage
of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by
rolling away.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging
to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage
of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by
rolling away.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging
to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
It defends itself by launching spikes, but its
aim isn’t very good at first. Only after a lot of
practice will it improve.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Mossy caves are their preferred dwellings.
Enzymes contained in mosses help Ferroseed’s
spikes grow big and strong.
